welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Waldfeucht, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover the beauty and culture of our town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling all cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
